lyrics:
"Family Tree" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Family Tree" [Intro:] You missed us? I know you did Ain't nobody that good that movies a do I got radio shoes, shit like that, you know we did it We never neglect ya'll though Yo, stuntin It's Guwap [Verse 1:] I got lots of bricks, cops can't stop this shit Fall off in the club just to stand on top this shit Partner in the pit and he still got bills of it I got bill of it cause I like the smell of it Man I just reek of it, and I can see the shit Say you can't see the bitch, bitch man I need a bitch When the real was late, I had to get this shit I might have missed this shit I might just hit your tree Hit in the head you bitch, throw as you said you bitch Go get your dad you trich, go suck your daddy dick Way above average bitch so can't fuck an average bitch I break up marriages, no horse and carriages Fresh as a sparrow ho, I watch 9 ladero ho Say that you all wished you smoked That make you regular ho My pack is so bujy and got me thinkin I'm better than you My friends said I made it simple That's what they makin it fo [Hook:] I got drinkers in my family (drinkin) Couple smokers in my family (smoking) Gangbangers in my family (bang) And I'm smoking on that family tree I got smokers in my family (wasted) A lot of drinkers in my family (faded) A couple gamblers in my family (gambling) And we smoking on that family tree [Verse 2:] With my famo rockin camo, missin with that Feragamo Well my uncle like the chambles cause the nigga like to gamble Say you caught you a ho, and too hot to handle You done fall and low your life's cut off and you lightin candles With a million I'll go broke, you can't hide or deny Girl you know you smoke that dope Don't tempt me, that damn lies I know your uncle front a fire, boy you know that boy get high I'm Mr. Sayin Anything, I can't work no 9 to 5 But when I hold this pistol on your boy Don't act like survive It be a cold day in hell if the nigga stay alive Get in line, I'll be with 20 bands I'm a shoot your ass like 20 times Glock 4-5 stay by my side I'll carve your ass like a porcupine [Hook:] I got drinkers in my family (drinkin) Couple smokers in my family (smoking) Gangbangers in my family (bang) And I'm smoking on that family tree I got smokers in my family (wasted) A lot of drinkers in my family (faded) A couple gamblers in my family (gambling) And we smoking on that family tree if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera
